scripts.crawl:topics: uv run --project packages/news-crawler-py python -m bigkinds_crawler.cli topics
scripts.crawl:news: uv run --project packages/news-crawler-py python -m bigkinds_crawler.cli news
scripts.crawl:details: uv run --project packages/news-crawler-py python -m bigkinds_crawler.cli details
scripts.crawl:pipeline: uv run --project packages/news-crawler-py python -m bigkinds_crawler.cli pipeline
scripts.env:load: export $(cat .env | grep -v '^#' | xargs) && echo 'Environment loaded from .env'
scripts.demo:quick: echo 'Quick demo using latest data...' && pnpm news:process output/$(ls output/ | tail -1)/topic-01
scripts.steps:crawl: pnpm crawl:topics && pnpm crawl:news output/$(ls output/ | tail -1) --topics 1,2,3
scripts.steps:process: pnpm crawl:details output/$(ls output/ | tail -1) --topics 1,2,3 && pnpm news:process output/$(ls output/ | tail -1)/topic-01
scripts.steps:audio: pnpm audio:generate output/$(ls output/ | tail -1)/topic-01 && pnpm audio:merge output/$(ls output/ | tail -1)/topic-01
